creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: front: two zebras standing side by side at L, each looking in opposite direction; orange background with orange and gray tree in ULQ; inside: red block with New Year's greeting in English and Japanese; separate yellow sheet with printed New Year's greeting and signature
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription, and Seal

b, in pe a) inside card, in pen: [Kiso + Toshi Yoshida / 19
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
